cmdGA

Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmdGA.Option
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultipleOption, NoOption, SingleOption

    public abstract class Option
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class represents an abstract option and its value. To work correctly an option must be linked to a parser. An option must had a name, that is the string in the command line to call this option. Also, can have an alias. The type of the parameters must be declared, using a instance of ParameterType. A default value must be provided.
    Author:
    Javier Iserte

    • Constructor Detail

      • Option

        public Option(Parser parser,
      java.lang.Object defaultValue,
      java.lang.String name,
      java.lang.String alias,
      ParameterType type)
        Creates a new instance of Option with alias.
        Parameters:
        parser - An instance of Parser that is linked to the option.
        defaultValue - The default value returned
        name - The string that is used to call this option in the command line.
        alias - An alias for the name.
        type - An instance of ParameterType that represents the type of the value returned.
